    #include <algorithm>
    #include <cstdio>
    #include <cstring>
    using namespace std;
    int a[1000005];
    int main()
    {
    	int t;
    	scanf ("%d", &t);
    	while (t--)
    	{
    		int n;
    		scanf ("%d", &n);
    		int hi = 0, temp;
    		memset (a, 0, sizeof(a));
    		for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i)
    		{
    			scanf ("%d", &temp);
    			hi = max(hi, temp);
    			++a[temp];
    			//printf("%d\n",a[temp]);
    		}
    		int ans = 0;
    		for (int i = hi; i > 1; --i)
    		{
    			int count = 0;
    			for (int j = i; j <= hi; j = j + i)//{
    				count += a[j];
                //printf("%d  %d\n",count,j );}
    			if (count > 1)
    			{
    				ans = i;
    				break;
    			}
    		}
    		if (ans)
    			printf ("%d\n", ans);
    		else
    			printf ("1\n");
    	}
    	return 0;
    }
